game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
Adds craftable teleport potions (throwable) and teleport pads.

USE on block to enchant location then PLACE to set, also right-clicking teleport pads lets you name it's destination or manually enter coordinates if you have 'teleport' privelage.
name: teleport_potion
short_description: Adds craftable teleport potions (throwable) and teleport pads.
title: Teleport Potion
